00041 struct ml_tlm2_delay_val {
00042   sc_time_unit tu;
00043   int delay_value;
00044 };
00045 
00051 class ml_tlm2_time_params {
00052  public:
00053   ml_tlm2_time_params() {};
00054   ml_tlm2_delay_val get_delay_struct(sc_time& delay) {
00055     static bool first = true;
00056     static sc_time_unit tu = SC_PS;
00057     static int mult;
00058     ml_tlm2_delay_val d;
00059     if(first) {
00060       first = false;
00061       if(sc_get_time_resolution() == sc_time(1, SC_FS)) {tu = SC_FS; mult = 1;};
00062       if(sc_get_time_resolution() == sc_time(10, SC_FS)) {tu = SC_FS; mult = 10;};
00063       if(sc_get_time_resolution() == sc_time(100, SC_FS)) {tu = SC_FS; mult = 100;};
00064       if(sc_get_time_resolution() == sc_time(1, SC_PS)) {tu = SC_PS; mult = 1;};
00065       if(sc_get_time_resolution() == sc_time(10, SC_PS)) {tu = SC_PS; mult = 10;};
00066       if(sc_get_time_resolution() == sc_time(100, SC_PS)) {tu = SC_PS; mult = 100;};
00067       if(sc_get_time_resolution() == sc_time(1, SC_NS)) {tu = SC_NS; mult = 1;};
00068       if(sc_get_time_resolution() == sc_time(10, SC_NS)) {tu = SC_NS; mult = 10;};
00069       if(sc_get_time_resolution() == sc_time(100, SC_NS)) {tu = SC_NS; mult = 100;};
00070       if(sc_get_time_resolution() == sc_time(1, SC_US)) {tu = SC_US; mult = 1;};
00071       if(sc_get_time_resolution() == sc_time(10, SC_US)) {tu = SC_US; mult = 10;};
00072       if(sc_get_time_resolution() == sc_time(100, SC_US)) {tu = SC_US; mult = 100;};
00073       if(sc_get_time_resolution() == sc_time(1, SC_MS)) {tu = SC_MS; mult = 1;};
00074       if(sc_get_time_resolution() == sc_time(10, SC_MS)) {tu = SC_MS; mult = 10;};
00075       if(sc_get_time_resolution() == sc_time(100, SC_MS)) {tu = SC_MS; mult = 100;};
00076       if(sc_get_time_resolution() == sc_time(1, SC_SEC)){tu = SC_SEC; mult = 1;};
00077       if(sc_get_time_resolution() == sc_time(10, SC_SEC)){tu = SC_SEC; mult = 10;};
00078       if(sc_get_time_resolution() == sc_time(100, SC_SEC)){tu = SC_SEC; mult = 100;};
00079     }
00080     d.tu = tu;
00081     d.delay_value = mult*delay.value();
00082     return d;
00083   }
00084 };
00085 
00086 static ml_tlm2_time_params* global_tp = new ml_tlm2_time_params;

00175 // Target connector 
00176 // adapter for propagating transactions from testbench to SC target
00183 template <class REQ, unsigned int BUSWIDTH, typename TYPES = tlm::tlm_base_protocol_types>
00184 class ml_tlm2_target_connector: public ml_tlm2_target_connector_base
00185   ,virtual public tlm::tlm_bw_transport_if<TYPES>
00186   {
00187     public :
00188     typedef typename TYPES::tlm_payload_type transaction_type;
00189     tlm::tlm_initiator_socket<BUSWIDTH, TYPES> isocket;
00190     
00191     // transaction mapping for nb calls
00192     bool disable_transaction_mapping;
00193     bool disable_transaction_mapping_set;
00194     std::string m_socket_name;
00195 
00196     // constructor
00197     ml_tlm2_target_connector(sc_module_name name_, tlm_target_socket<BUSWIDTH,TYPES> &s, std::string sname) :
00198     isocket("isocket"),
00199     disable_transaction_mapping(false),
00200     disable_transaction_mapping_set(false),
00201     m_socket_name(sname)
00202     {
00203       isocket(*this);
00204       isocket(s);
00205       is_target = true; 
00206       register_top_of_the_socket_name(sname);
00207       ml_tlm2_do_register_target(sname,name());
00208       uvm_ml_utils::add_socket(sname, this);
00209     }
00210     
00211     void b_transport(uvm_ml_packed_obj& vt, sc_time_unit *delay_unit, double *delay_value, sc_time_unit time_unit, double time_value) {
00212       tlm_generic_payload * tlm_gp = 0;
00213 
00214       sc_time delay = sc_time(*delay_value, (sc_time_unit)*delay_unit);
00215 
00216       ml_tlm2_unpack_create(&vt, tlm_gp);
00217 
00218       // Extract tlm_gp
00219       transaction_type * tx = (transaction_type *)tlm_gp;
00220 
00221       // Hold the generic_payload until transaction is completed
00222       //assert(tx->has_mm());
00223       if(!tx->has_mm()) {
00224         UVM_ML_SC_REPORT_ERROR("UVM-SC adapter: b_transport failed because the transaction has no memory manager","");
00225         return;
00226       };
00227       tx->acquire();
00228 
00229       // send a TLM2 transaction to the DUT
00230       isocket->b_transport(*(dynamic_cast<REQ *>(tx)), delay);
00231 
00232       // Reconstruct delay
00233       ml_tlm2_delay_val delay_struct = global_tp->get_delay_struct(delay);
00234       *delay_value= delay_struct.delay_value;
00235       *delay_unit = (sc_time_unit)delay_struct.tu;
00236 
00237       // Pack into ml packed object
00238       ml_tlm2_pack(*tlm_gp, &vt);
00239 
00240       tx->release();
00241     }
00242 
00243     tlm_sync_enum nb_transport_fw(uvm_ml_packed_obj& vt, tlm_phase_enum *phase, unsigned int transaction_id, sc_time_unit *delay_unit, double *delay_value, sc_time_unit time_unit, double time_value) {
00244       tlm_generic_payload * tlm_gp = 0;
00245 
00246       sc_time delay = sc_time(*delay_value, (sc_time_unit)*delay_unit);
00247       tlm_phase fw_phase(*phase);
00248 
00249       ml_tlm2_unpack_create(&vt, tlm_gp);
00250 
00251       // map the transaction if needed
00252       set_transaction_mapping();
00253       if (disable_transaction_mapping == false) {
00254         if (*phase == BEGIN_REQ) {
00255           //assert (transaction_id != ML_TLM2_UNINITIALIZED_ID);
00256           if(transaction_id == ML_TLM2_UNINITIALIZED_ID) {
00257             UVM_ML_SC_REPORT_ERROR("UVM-SC adapter: nb_transport_fw failed due to uninitialized transaction","");
00258             return TLM_COMPLETED;
00259           };
00260           ml_tlm2_map_transaction(tlm_gp, transaction_id);
00261         } else if (*phase == END_RESP) {
00262           // retrieve the original gp sent on the forward path
00263           transaction_type *mapped_trans = 
00264             dynamic_cast<transaction_type*>(ml_tlm2_get_transaction_by_id(transaction_id));
00265           if (!mapped_trans) {
00266             ml_tlm2_transaction_mapping_update_error(m_socket_name,"nb_transport_fw",*phase);
00267           }
00268           // set the original gp in the current request. no fields are updated
00269           tlm_gp = mapped_trans; 
00270         }
00271       }
00272 
00273       // Extract tlm_gp
00274       transaction_type * tx = (transaction_type *)tlm_gp;
00275 
00276       // Hold the generic_payload until transaction is completed
00277       //assert(tx->has_mm());
00278       if(!(tx->has_mm())) {
00279         UVM_ML_SC_REPORT_ERROR("UVM-SC adapter: nb_transport_fw failed because the transaction has no memory manager","");
00280         return TLM_COMPLETED;
00281       };
00282       tx->acquire();
00283 
00284       // send a TLM2 transaction to the DUT
00285       tlm_sync_enum ret = isocket->nb_transport_fw(*(dynamic_cast<REQ *>(tx)), fw_phase, delay);
00286 
00287       *phase = (tlm_phase_enum)((unsigned int)fw_phase);
00288 
00289       // Reconstruct delay
00290       ml_tlm2_delay_val delay_struct = global_tp->get_delay_struct(delay);
00291       *delay_value= delay_struct.delay_value;
00292       *delay_unit = (sc_time_unit)delay_struct.tu;
00293 
00294       // release mapped transaction
00295       if (disable_transaction_mapping == false) { 
00296         if (*phase == END_RESP || ret == TLM_COMPLETED) {
00297           bool result = ml_tlm2_release_transaction(tlm_gp, transaction_id);
00298           if (!result) {
00299             ml_tlm2_transaction_mapping_remove_error(m_socket_name,"nb_transport_fw",*phase,ret);
00300           }             
00301         }
00302       }
00303 
00304       // Pack into ml packed object
00305       ml_tlm2_pack(*tlm_gp, &vt);
00306       
00307       if(tx->get_ref_count() != 0) {
00308         tx->release();      
00309       };
00310 
00311       return ret;
00312     }
00313 
00314     tlm_sync_enum nb_transport_bw(REQ& trans, tlm_phase& phase, sc_time& delay)
00315     {
00316       sc_time_unit time_unit;
00317       double       time_value;
00318       sc_time_unit delay_unit;
00319       double       delay_value;
00320       unsigned int transaction_id = ML_TLM2_UNINITIALIZED_ID;
00321       tlm_generic_payload * t1 = 0;
00322 
00323       uvm_ml_packed_obj* v = uvm_ml_utils::get_mlupo_from_pool();
00324       uvm_ml_utils::allocate_mlupo(v);
00325 
00326       // copy original transaction id to outgoing transaction
00327       set_transaction_mapping();
00328       if (disable_transaction_mapping == false) {
00329         transaction_id = ml_tlm2_get_id_by_transaction(trans);
00330         if (transaction_id == ML_TLM2_UNINITIALIZED_ID) {
00331           ml_tlm2_transaction_mapping_update_error(m_socket_name,"nb_transport_bw",phase);
00332         }
00333       }
00334 
00335       // Pack to ml packed object
00336       ml_tlm2_pack(trans, v);
00337 
00338       ml_tlm2_delay_val delay_struct = global_tp->get_delay_struct(delay);
00339       delay_value = delay_struct.delay_value;
00340       delay_unit = (sc_time_unit)delay_struct.tu;
00341       tlm_phase_enum phase_id = (tlm_phase_enum) (unsigned int) phase;
00342 
00343       sc_time ct = sc_time_stamp();
00344       delay_struct = global_tp->get_delay_struct(ct);
00345       time_value= delay_struct.delay_value;
00346       time_unit = (sc_time_unit)delay_struct.tu;
00347 
00348       // Call testbench
00349       tlm_sync_enum ret = (tlm_sync_enum) uvm_ml_tlm_trans::tlm2_nb_transport_bw(conn_id, 
00350                                                                                              v, 
00351                                                                                              (unsigned int *)&phase_id,
00352                                                                                              transaction_id,
00353                                                                                              &delay_unit, 
00354                                                                                              &delay_value
00355                                                                                              );
00356 
00357       // update delay and phase
00358       delay = sc_time(delay_value, (sc_time_unit)(delay_unit));
00359       phase = phase_id;
00360 
00361       // Unpack ml packed object 
00362       ml_tlm2_unpack_create(v, t1);
00363 
00364       // Extract tlm_gp
00365       transaction_type * tx = (transaction_type *)t1;
00366       tx->acquire();
00367 
00368       // Update transaction fields
00369       trans.set_address(tx->get_address());
00370       trans.set_response_status(tx->get_response_status());
00371       if(trans.is_read()) {
00372         ml_tlm2_update_data_from_response(trans, *tx, m_socket_name);
00373       }
00374       trans.update_extensions_from(*tx);
00375 
00376       uvm_ml_utils::release_mlupo_to_pool(v);
00377       tx->release();
00378 
00379       return ret;
00380     }
00381 
00382     unsigned int transport_dbg(uvm_ml_packed_obj& vt, sc_time_unit time_unit, double time_value) {
00383       tlm_generic_payload * tlm_gp = 0;
00384 
00385       ml_tlm2_unpack_create(&vt, tlm_gp);
00386 
00387       // Extract tlm_gp
00388       transaction_type * tx = (transaction_type *)tlm_gp;
00389 
00390       //assert(tx->has_mm());
00391       if(!(tx->has_mm())) {
00392         UVM_ML_SC_REPORT_ERROR("UVM-SC adapter: transport_dbg failed because the transaction has no memory manager","");
00393         return 0;
00394       };
00395       tx->acquire();
00396 
00397       // send a TLM2 transaction to the DUT
00398       unsigned ret = isocket->transport_dbg(*(dynamic_cast<REQ *>(tx)));
00399 
00400       // Pack into ml packed object
00401       ml_tlm2_pack(*tlm_gp, &vt);
00402 
00403       tx->release();
00404       return ret;
00405     }
00406 
00407     void invalidate_direct_mem_ptr(sc_dt::uint64 start_range, sc_dt::uint64 end_range){};    
00408 
00409 private:
00410   
00411     inline void set_transaction_mapping() {
00412       if (!disable_transaction_mapping_set) {
00413         disable_transaction_mapping = ml_tlm2_transaction_mapping_disabled(m_socket_name);
00414         disable_transaction_mapping_set = true;
00415       };
00416     }
00417   }; // class ml_tlm2_target_connector

00421 // Initiator connector 
00422 // adapter for propagating transactions from SC initiator to testbench
00429 template <class REQ, unsigned int BUSWIDTH, typename TYPES = tlm::tlm_base_protocol_types>
00430 class ml_tlm2_initiator_connector: public ml_tlm2_initiator_connector_base
00431   ,virtual public tlm::tlm_fw_transport_if<TYPES>
00432   {
00433     public :
00434     typedef typename TYPES::tlm_payload_type transaction_type;
00435     tlm::tlm_target_socket<BUSWIDTH, TYPES> tsocket;
00436 
00437     // transaction mapping for nb calls
00438     bool disable_transaction_mapping;
00439     bool disable_transaction_mapping_set;
00440     std::string m_socket_name;
00441     
00442     // constructor
00443     ml_tlm2_initiator_connector(sc_module_name name_, tlm_initiator_socket<BUSWIDTH,TYPES> &s, std::string sname) :
00444     tsocket("tsocket"),
00445     disable_transaction_mapping(false),
00446     disable_transaction_mapping_set(false),
00447     m_socket_name(sname)
00448     {
00449       tsocket(*this);
00450       s.bind(tsocket);
00451       register_top_of_the_socket_name(sname);
00452       ml_tlm2_do_register_initiator(sname,name());
00453       is_target = false; 
00454       
00455       //add to socket map
00456       uvm_ml_utils::add_socket(sname, this);
00457     }
00458     
00459     void b_transport(REQ& trans, sc_time& delay) {
00460       sc_time_unit time_unit;
00461       double       time_value;
00462       sc_time_unit delay_unit;
00463       double       delay_value;
00464       tlm_generic_payload * t1 = 0;
00465 
00466       if (trans.get_data_ptr() == NULL) {
00467         SC_REPORT_FATAL("Error", "ml_tlm2_connector: transaction has NULL data pointer");
00468         trans.set_response_status(TLM_GENERIC_ERROR_RESPONSE);
00469         return;
00470       };
00471 
00472       // Pack transaction into ml packed object
00473       uvm_ml_packed_obj* v = uvm_ml_utils::get_mlupo_from_pool();
00474       uvm_ml_utils::allocate_mlupo(v);
00475 
00476       ml_tlm2_pack(trans, v);
00477 
00478       ml_tlm2_delay_val delay_struct = global_tp->get_delay_struct(delay);
00479       delay_value = delay_struct.delay_value;
00480       delay_unit = (sc_time_unit)delay_struct.tu;
00481 
00482       sc_time ct = sc_time_stamp();
00483       delay_struct = global_tp->get_delay_struct(ct);
00484       time_value= delay_struct.delay_value;
00485       time_unit = (sc_time_unit)delay_struct.tu;
00486 
00487       // Call testbench
00488       uvm_ml_tlm_trans::tlm2_b_transport(conn_id, v, &delay_unit, &delay_value);
00489 
00490       delay = sc_time(delay_value, (sc_time_unit)(delay_unit));
00491      
00492       // Unpack ml packed object
00493       ml_tlm2_unpack_create(v, t1);
00494 
00495       // Extract tlm_gp
00496       transaction_type * tx = (transaction_type *)t1;
00497       //assert(tx != NULL);
00498       if(tx == NULL) {
00499         UVM_ML_SC_REPORT_ERROR("UVM-SC adapter: b_transport failed because the transaction is NULL","");
00500         return;
00501       };
00502       tx->acquire();
00503 
00504       // update transaction fields
00505       trans.set_address(tx->get_address());
00506       trans.set_response_status(tx->get_response_status());
00507       if(trans.is_read())
00508         ml_tlm2_update_data_from_response(trans, *(tx), m_socket_name);
00509       trans.update_extensions_from(*t1);
00510 
00511       uvm_ml_utils::release_mlupo_to_pool(v);
00512 
00513       tx->release();
00514     }
00515 
00516     tlm_sync_enum nb_transport_fw(REQ& trans, tlm_phase& phase, sc_time& delay) {
00517       sc_time_unit time_unit;
00518       double       time_value;
00519       sc_time_unit delay_unit;
00520       double       delay_value;
00521       unsigned int transaction_id = ML_TLM2_UNINITIALIZED_ID;
00522       tlm_generic_payload * t1 = 0;
00523 
00524       // map transaction if needed
00525       set_transaction_mapping();      
00526       if (disable_transaction_mapping == false) {
00527         // make sure transaction has a memory manager      
00528         if (!trans.has_mm()) {
00529           ml_tlm2_transaction_mapping_mm_error(m_socket_name);
00530         }
00531         if (phase == BEGIN_REQ) {       
00532           ml_tlm2_map_transaction(&trans, transaction_id);      
00533         } else if (phase == END_RESP /*|| status == TLM_COMPLETED*/) {
00534           transaction_id = ml_tlm2_get_id_by_transaction(trans);
00535           if (transaction_id == ML_TLM2_UNINITIALIZED_ID) {
00536             ml_tlm2_transaction_mapping_update_error(m_socket_name,"nb_transport_fw",phase);
00537           }
00538         }
00539       }
00540 
00541       // Pack to ml packed object
00542       uvm_ml_packed_obj* v = uvm_ml_utils::get_mlupo_from_pool();
00543       uvm_ml_utils::allocate_mlupo(v);
00544 
00545       ml_tlm2_pack(trans, v);
00546 
00547       ml_tlm2_delay_val delay_struct = global_tp->get_delay_struct(delay);
00548       delay_value = delay_struct.delay_value;
00549       delay_unit = (sc_time_unit)delay_struct.tu;
00550       tlm_phase_enum phase_id = (tlm_phase_enum)(unsigned int)phase;
00551 
00552       sc_time ct = sc_time_stamp();
00553       delay_struct = global_tp->get_delay_struct(ct);
00554       time_value= delay_struct.delay_value;
00555       time_unit = (sc_time_unit)delay_struct.tu;
00556 
00557       // Call testbench
00558       tlm_sync_enum ret = (tlm_sync_enum) uvm_ml_tlm_trans::tlm2_nb_transport_fw(conn_id, 
00559                                                                                              v, 
00560                                                                                              (unsigned int *)&phase_id,
00561                                                                                              transaction_id,
00562                                                                                              &delay_unit, 
00563                                                                                              &delay_value
00564                                                                                              );
00565 
00566       phase = phase_id;
00567       delay = sc_time(delay_value, (sc_time_unit)(delay_unit));
00568 
00569       // Unpack ml packed object 
00570       ml_tlm2_unpack_create(v, t1);
00571 
00572       // Extract tlm_gp
00573       transaction_type * tx = (transaction_type *)t1;
00574       tx->acquire();
00575 
00576       // Update transaction fields
00577       trans.set_address(tx->get_address());
00578       trans.set_response_status(tx->get_response_status());
00579       if(trans.is_read())
00580         ml_tlm2_update_data_from_response(trans, *tx, m_socket_name);
00581       trans.update_extensions_from(*tx);
00582 
00583       // release transaction from map if needed
00584       if ((disable_transaction_mapping == false) && (phase == END_RESP || ret == TLM_COMPLETED)) {
00585         bool result = ml_tlm2_release_transaction(t1, transaction_id);
00586         if (!result) { // may have been removed already by target connector
00587           //ml_tlm2_transaction_mapping_remove_error(m_socket_name,"nb_transport_fw",phase,ret);
00588         }
00589       }
00590 
00591       uvm_ml_utils::release_mlupo_to_pool(v);
00592 
00593       tx->release();
00594       return ret;
00595     }
00596 
00597     tlm_sync_enum nb_transport_bw(uvm_ml_packed_obj& vt, tlm_phase_enum *phase, unsigned int transaction_id, sc_time_unit *delay_unit, double *delay_value, sc_time_unit time_unit, double time_value) {
00598       tlm_generic_payload * tlm_gp = 0;
00599       transaction_type * actual_trans;
00600 
00601       ml_tlm2_unpack_create(&vt, tlm_gp);
00602       //assert(tlm_gp->has_mm());    
00603       if(!(tlm_gp->has_mm())) {
00604         UVM_ML_SC_REPORT_ERROR("UVM-SC adapter: nb_transport_bw failed because the transaction had no memory manager","");
00605         return TLM_COMPLETED;
00606       };
00607 
00608       // Extract tlm_gp
00609       transaction_type * tx = (transaction_type *)tlm_gp;
00610 
00611       sc_time delay = sc_time(*delay_value, (sc_time_unit)*delay_unit);
00612       tlm_phase bw_phase(*phase);
00613 
00614       // if transaction is mapped, fetch original object
00615       if ((disable_transaction_mapping == false) && 
00616           (*phase == END_REQ || *phase == BEGIN_RESP)) {
00617         // retrieve the original gp sent on the forward path
00618         transaction_type *mapped_trans = 
00619           dynamic_cast<transaction_type*>(ml_tlm2_get_transaction_by_id(transaction_id));
00620         if (!mapped_trans) {
00621           ml_tlm2_transaction_mapping_update_error(m_socket_name,"nb_transport_bw",*phase);
00622         }
00623         
00624         // update original transaction with tx transaction fields
00625         ml_tlm2_bw_update_gp(*mapped_trans, *tx);
00626         // in case of a read transaction, need to copy the data as well
00627         if (mapped_trans->is_read()) {
00628           ml_tlm2_update_data_from_response(*mapped_trans, *(tx), m_socket_name);
00629         }
00630         actual_trans = mapped_trans;                  
00631         // need to acquire then release the temp transaction to make sure memory is cleared
00632         tx->acquire();
00633         tx->release();
00634       } else {
00635         actual_trans = tx;
00636       };
00637 
00638       actual_trans->acquire();
00639 
00640       // send a TLM2 transaction to the DUT
00641       tlm_sync_enum ret = tsocket->nb_transport_bw(*(dynamic_cast<REQ *>(actual_trans)), bw_phase, delay);
00642 
00643       *phase = (tlm_phase_enum)(unsigned int) bw_phase;
00644 
00645       // Reconstruct delay
00646       ml_tlm2_delay_val delay_struct = global_tp->get_delay_struct(delay);
00647       *delay_value= delay_struct.delay_value;
00648       *delay_unit = (sc_time_unit)delay_struct.tu;
00649 
00650       // Pack into ml packed object
00651       ml_tlm2_pack(*actual_trans, &vt);
00652 
00653       // release transaction from map if needed
00654       if ((disable_transaction_mapping == false) && 
00655           (bw_phase == END_RESP || ret == TLM_COMPLETED)) {      
00656         bool result = ml_tlm2_release_transaction(actual_trans, transaction_id);
00657         if (!result) {
00658           ml_tlm2_transaction_mapping_remove_error(m_socket_name,"nb_transport_bw",bw_phase,ret);
00659         }      
00660       }
00661 
00662       actual_trans->release();
00663       return ret;
00664     }
00665 
00666     unsigned int transport_dbg(REQ& trans) {
00667       sc_time_unit time_unit;
00668       double       time_value;
00669       tlm_generic_payload *t1 = 0;
00670 
00671       // Pack to ml packed object
00672       uvm_ml_packed_obj* v = uvm_ml_utils::get_mlupo_from_pool();
00673       uvm_ml_utils::allocate_mlupo(v);
00674 
00675       ml_tlm2_pack(trans, v);
00676 
00677       sc_time ct = sc_time_stamp();
00678       ml_tlm2_delay_val delay_struct = global_tp->get_delay_struct(ct);
00679       time_value= delay_struct.delay_value;
00680       time_unit = (sc_time_unit)delay_struct.tu;
00681 
00682       // Call testbench
00683       unsigned ret = uvm_ml_tlm_trans::tlm2_transport_dbg(conn_id, v);
00684 
00685       // Unpack ml packed object
00686       ml_tlm2_unpack_create(v, t1);
00687 
00688       // Extract tlm_gp
00689       transaction_type * tx = (transaction_type *)t1;
00690       tx->acquire();
00691 
00692       // Update transaction fields
00693       trans.set_address(tx->get_address());
00694       trans.set_response_status(tx->get_response_status());
00695       if(trans.is_read())
00696         ml_tlm2_update_data_from_response(trans, *tx, m_socket_name);
00697       trans.update_extensions_from(*tx);
00698 
00699       uvm_ml_utils::release_mlupo_to_pool(v);
00700 
00701       tx->release();
00702       return ret;
00703     }
00704     
00705     virtual bool get_direct_mem_ptr(REQ& trans, tlm::tlm_dmi& dmi_data) {
00706       return false; 
00707     }
00708 
00709 private:
00710   
00711     inline void set_transaction_mapping() {
00712       if (!disable_transaction_mapping_set) {
00713         disable_transaction_mapping = ml_tlm2_transaction_mapping_disabled(m_socket_name);
00714         disable_transaction_mapping_set = true;
00715       };
00716     }
00717   }; // class ml_tlm2_initiator_connector
